text: Rhonda Fleming (August 10, 1923 â€“ October 14, 2020) was an American television and movie actress. She starred in many television programs and lots of movies in the 1940s and 1950s. She was known as one of the most beautiful actors of her time. Fleming was born in Hollywood, California. Fleming died on October 14, 2020 in Santa Monica, California from pneumonia at the age of 97. ==References== Category:Actors from Hollywood Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths
title: Rhonda Fleming
